item.description:
We all work hard to support and educate our students. Isn't it about time they worked for us? Yeah! Well, a group of them are willing to entertain us for a pittance so let's check out their performance of live theater in this show with the long, unpronounceable name.

Join us on a kaleidoscope road trip through an American landscape filled with hope and dreams, violence, chicken jokes, ill-conceived business ventures, backyard barbecues, and love stories. Along the way, we will encounter bathing beauties and lady truckers, derelicts and would-be farmers, lovers, more lovers, and of course, Mom.

Tickets cost less than a couple of kernels of popped corn at the movie theater. ($1)
item.name: Jumbo Theater: bobrauschenbergamerica
